          <title>
            <string language="en">Effect of force on water taps</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt der Kraft auf Wasserhähnen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet de la force sur des prises de l'eau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito da força em torneiras da água</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto di forza sui colpetti dell'acqua</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση της δύναμης στους κρουνούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto de la fuerza en golpecitos del agua</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows two water taps with clockwise (A) and anti-clockwise (B) force directions.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">anti-clockwise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">clockwise</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">turning force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water tap</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt zwei Wasserhähne mit 
rechtsem herum (a) und nach links (b) Kraftrichtungen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme montre deux prises de l'eau avec (a)
horaire et (b) directions dans le sens contraire des aiguilles d'une 
montre de force.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra duas torneiras da água com 
(A) sentido horário e (B) sentidos anti-horário da força.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema mostra due colpetti dell'acqua con 
(A) in senso orario e (B) i sensi in senso antiorario della forza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα εμφανίζει δύο κρουνούς με 
δεξιόστροφο (A) και τις αντίθετες προς την φορά των δεικτών του
ρολογιού (B) κατευθύνσεις δύναμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra dos golpecitos del agua con
(a) a la derecha y (b) direcciones a la izquierda de la fuerza.</string>
          </description>
